{{cpp/types/numeric_limits/title|is_iec559}}
{{cpp/types/numeric_limits/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl rev multi|until1=c++11
|dcl1=
static const bool is_iec559;
|dcl2=
static constexpr bool is_iec559;
}}
{{dcl end}}

The value of {{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;T&gt;::is_iec559}} is {{c|true}} for all floating-point types {{tt|T}} which fulfill the requirements of IEC 559 ([[enwiki:IEEE 754-2008|IEEE 754]]) standard. If {{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;T&gt;::is_iec559}} is {{c|true}}, then {{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;T&gt;::has_infinity}}, {{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;T&gt;::has_quiet_NaN}}, and {{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;T&gt;::has_signaling_NaN}} are also {{c|true}}.
